title: Poster, "The Yale Symphony Orchestra, Mauceri Janacek, Dvorak", n.d.
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Poster design consisting of juxtaposition of green and red typography. Across top "Mauceri" in thin green text. Below in heavier text Janácek and in large heavy text at bottom, Dvorak. Thin red letters at left above the J "The Yale Symphony/ Orchestra" and at right in red "Saturday April 14 / Woolsey Hall at 8:30 / Admission is free". The words "Sinfoniette" and "Symphony No.*" as well as all diacritical marks are also in red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "The Yale Symphony Orchestra, Mauceri Janacek, Dvorak", n.d..
n.d.. Screenprint on cream wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-421.
